author: nlehuen
msg: Fix for bug #2 "multiple/redundant interpreter creation" (according to the JIRA repository) :
- in mod_python.c, an APR mutex is used to make sure that multiple interpreter are not created
- in apache.py, the import lock is used to make sure that the same module is not loaded multiple times

author: akarasulu
msg: o cleaned up project.xml names to reflect new modules Enrique has setup
o add store properties so we can find the path to test ldifs without blowing
up when multiproject builds are used
o made changes to store test case to use the new test property
